mapper.select: select f.post_file_no as postFileNo, f.post_no as postNo, f.post_file_name as postFileName, p.user_no as userNo, p.post_content as postContent, p.post_date as postDate from post_file f join post p on (f.post_no = p.post_no) where p.user_no = ${_parameter}
mapper.insert: insert into post (post_no, user_no, post_content, post_date) values (#{postNo}, #{userNo}, #{postContent}, sysdate)
insert into post_file (post_file_no, post_no, post_file_name) values (seq_post_file.nextval, #{postNo}, #{postFileName})
insert into hashtag (hash_no, post_no, hash_name) values (seq_hashtag.nextval, #{postNo}, #{tag})
